title: LIFELINE / GIVING UP
description: When you lose enough Morale (Volition), you feel like giving up. This is the freebie/tutorial.

dialogueTree.title: Volition: "Despair creeps into you, getting fa..."
dialogueTree.text: Despair creeps into you, getting fat on your weakness. Whatever noble intentions you once had as a police officer -- it's eating them all up now.

links.title: Inland Empire: "There's something else in there. Th..."
links.text: There's something else in there. There has to be. But -- it's like reaching your hand into muddy water, fishing around, and coming up with nothing...

links.title: Interfacing: "Yeah, I'm pretty sure you're shit o..."
links.text: Yeah, I'm pretty sure you're shit out of luck *fishing around* right now. You're drowning.

links.title: Conceptualization: "You're still coming up with sentenc..."
links.text: You're still coming up with sentences. That's a step up from total annihilation, right?

links.title: You: ""I'm seriously running out of shits..."
links.text: "I'm seriously running out of shits to give, Kim. Fuck you."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fuck me? I understand this is by n..."
links.text: "Fuck me? I understand this is by no means an easy investigation, but..."

links.title: Volition: "Nothing you can say would make you..."
links.text: Nothing you can say would make you feel any better now...

links.title: You: ""I've wasted my life protecting hum..."
links.text: "I've wasted my life protecting humans. They don't deserve it."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I don't dispute that you have been..."
links.text: "I don't dispute that you have been charged with protecting the people of a particularly... challenging district. But poverty does not make one a loser -- poverty is just... poverty."

links.title: You: ""I'm done. No one even likes cops.""
links.text: "I'm done. No one even likes cops."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Yes, it can be difficult to be on..."
links.text: "Yes, it can be difficult to be on the receiving end of so much distrust and outright hatred," he says with a sad half-smile.

links.title: You: ""I wish I was fucking dead. Fuck yo..."
links.text: "I wish I was fucking dead. Fuck you, fuck you."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: "He watches your meltdown stoically..."
links.text: He watches your meltdown stoically from behind the lenses of his glasses.

links.title: You: ""I'm seriously running out of shits..."
links.text: "I'm seriously running out of shits to give, Cuno. I'm quitting."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno don't give a shit about your..."
links.text: "Cuno don't give a shit about your shits."

links.title: You: ""I've wasted my life protecting hum..."
links.text: "I've wasted my life protecting humans. They don't deserve it."

links.title: Cuno: ""That you are a loser, Cuno doesn't..."
links.text: "That you are a loser, Cuno doesn't doubt, but why go around whining about it?"

links.title: You: ""I'm done. No one even likes cops.""
links.text: "I'm done. No one even likes cops."

links.title: Cuno: ""Too late for that. So whatcha gonn..."
links.text: "Too late for that. So whatcha gonna do now? Skewer yourself?"

links.title: You: ""I wish I was fucking dead. Fuck yo..."
links.text: "I wish I was fucking dead. Fuck you, fuck you Cuno."

links.title: Cuno: ""Cuno knew the pig was a f****t.""
links.text: "Cuno knew the pig was a f****t."

links.title: You: "I'm seriously running out of shits..."
links.text: I'm seriously running out of shits to give. To hell with all of this.

links.title: You: ""I've wasted my life protecting hum..."
links.text: "I've wasted my life protecting humans. They don't deserve it."

links.title: You: "I'm done. No one even likes cops."
links.text: I'm done. No one even likes cops.

links.title: You: "Fuck Martinaise, fuck Revachol. And..."
links.text: Fuck Martinaise, fuck Revachol. And fuck me. I'm done.
